n = int(input())
a = input().split()
a = list(map(int, a))

a.sort()

min_a = a[0]
max_a = a[-1]

if max_a - min_a <= 1:
    print(n)
    print(*a)
else:
    if max_a - min_a == 2:
        a.remove(max_a)
        a.remove(min_a)
        print(n - 2)
        print(min_a, min_a, *a, max_a, max_a)
    else:
        a.remove(max_a)
        a.remove(min_a)
        a.remove(min_a)
        a.remove(max_a)
        print(n - 4)
        print(min_a, min_a, *a, max_a, max_a)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

b = [a[0]]
for i in range(1, n):
    if a[i] - b[-1] == 1:
        b.append(a[i-1])
    b.append(a[i])

print(len(b))
print(*b)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] * (n + 1)
    g = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        f[i + 1] = max(f[i], g[i])
        if i + 2 <= n and a[i] + 1 >= a[i + 1]:
            g[i + 2] = max(g[i + 2], f[i] + 1)
        if i + 3 <= n and a[i] + 1 >= a[i + 1] and a[i + 1] + 1 >= a[i + 2]:
            g[i + 3] = max(g[i + 3], f[i] + 2)
    ans = f[n]
    print(ans)
    b = []
    i = n
    while i > 0:
        if g[i] == ans:
            b.append(a[i - 1])
            ans -= 1
            i -= 2
        elif f[i - 1] == ans:
            b.append(a[i - 2])
            ans -= 1
            i -= 1
    print(*b[::-1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
